18 
19 #ifndef __G_STDIOPRIVATE_H__
20 #define __G_STDIOPRIVATE_H__
21 
22 G_BEGIN_DECLS
23 
24 #if defined (G_OS_WIN32)
25 
26 struct _GWin32PrivateStat
27 {
28   guint32 volume_serial;
29   guint64 file_index;
30   guint64 attributes;
31   guint64 allocated_size;
32   guint32 reparse_tag;
33 
34   guint32 st_dev;
35   guint32 st_ino;
36   guint16 st_mode;
37   guint16 st_uid;
38   guint16 st_gid;
39   guint32 st_nlink;
40   guint64 st_size;
41   guint64 st_ctime;
42   guint64 st_atime;
43   guint64 st_mtime;
44 };
45 
46 typedef struct _GWin32PrivateStat GWin32PrivateStat;
47 
48 int g_win32_stat_utf8     (const gchar       *filename,
49                            GWin32PrivateStat *buf);
50 
51 int g_win32_lstat_utf8    (const gchar       *filename,
52                            GWin32PrivateStat *buf);
53 
54 int g_win32_readlink_utf8 (const gchar *filename,
55                            gchar       *buf,
56                            gsize        buf_size);
57 
58 int g_win32_fstat         (int                fd,
59                            GWin32PrivateStat *buf);
60 
61 #endif
62 
63 G_END_DECLS
64 
65 #endif /* __G_STDIOPRIVATE_H__ */
